resources.string: Be aware that the DNS server you are connected to is able to record which sites you are visiting. Check the respective privacy statements for more information.

This app is open source. The source code can be accessed at smokescreen.app/source.
Furthermore the app doesn't contain ads and does not track or collect any data about you.

Version %1s
Build %2d
Database version %3d

© Daniel Wolf 2018
All rights reserved.
support@frostnerd.com
Hey, I found this app which encrypts your DNS queries to give you more privacy and security. Check it out here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.frostnerd.smokescreen
